message.content:
Step 1: Identify the four specific line items:

• Value1 is the systematic allocation of depreciable amount over an asset’s useful life. In the cash flow statement, this is the “Depreciation” line. Its value is 105893.32.

• Value2 is the reduction in the amount of assets held for sale in the ordinary course of business, in production for sale, or in the process of being manufactured during the period. In this statement, it is represented by the “(Increase) Decrease in Inventory” line. Its value is -5600000.00.

• Value3 is the net amount of cash and cash equivalents generated from an entity’s activities for acquiring and disposing of long-term assets and other investments not included in cash equivalents, as well as the receipt of interest and dividends. This corresponds to the “Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities” line. Its value is -1726015.08.

• Value4 is the net addition in the cash and cash equivalents during the period. This is the “Net Increase” line, with a value of -8042420.52.

Step 2: Present the solution in the required JSON format.

{
  "solution": {
    "value1": "105893.32",
    "value2": "-5600000.00",
    "value3": "-1726015.08",
    "value4": "-8042420.52"
  }
}
